reasoning_log: The matching process relied heavily on unique architectural features and material consistency. Desc_1 and Desc_2 were matched to Image_1 and Image_2 based on the shared gray wood-look flooring and their spatial relationship (Image_1 showing the overall space and staircase, Image_2 focusing on the window with security bars). Desc_3 was uniquely identified by the combination of wooden railings and old speckled floor tiles (Image_3). The two bathrooms were easily distinguished: Desc_4 required a window (Image_4), while Desc_9 required an '異形空間' (irregular shape, likely under the stairs) and an extractor fan (Image_9). The four bedrooms (Desc_6, Desc_7, Desc_8, Desc_10) were differentiated by their window/balcony type and structural elements: Image_6 has an enclosed balcony (封閉式陽台), Image_8 has a visible low beam (頂棚樑稍低) and an internal door, leaving Image_7 and Image_10 for the two remaining bright, open-balcony descriptions (Desc_7 and Desc_10). Image_7 was assigned to the '寬敞' (spacious) description (Desc_7) due to its slightly wider perspective.

matching_result_list.evidence: Main downstairs living area view, showing the new gray wood-look flooring, white walls, and the clear division created by the staircase ('樓層分區明確').
Shows the living area near the entrance/window, featuring the large window with security bars ('鐵窗防護') and the same gray wood-look flooring.
Clear view of the staircase with wooden railings ('木扶手') and the old speckled floor tiles ('老式地磚') on the landing.
Bathroom with a visible external window ('有對外窗') and a modern sink cabinet ('新式洗手台櫃').
Kitchen featuring a complete L-shaped cabinet layout ('完整L型廚具'), stove, hood, and stainless steel countertop ('新式鋼檯面').

tag_list: 瓦斯爐與抽油煙機齊備

matching_result_list.evidence: Bedroom characterized by the sliding door leading to a clearly enclosed/sealed balcony area ('附封閉式陽台').
High-floor bedroom with excellent light ('採光極佳') and a wide perspective, fitting the '空間寬敞' tag better than Image_10.
Bedroom showing a visible structural beam near the ceiling ('頂棚樑稍低') and an internal door, suggesting potential for suite planning.
Bathroom featuring a distinct sloped ceiling/wall, confirming '異形空間利用' (likely under the stairs), and an extractor fan ('有抽風設備').
High-floor bedroom with large sliding doors providing '大面採光' and balcony access, assigned after Image_7 was matched to the '寬敞' description.
